00278 /*
00279 ** Facility:
00280 **   Xamine -- NSCL display program C++ widget support.
00281 ** Abstract:
00282 **   XMList.h:
00283 **     This file provides a classs definition for the XMList class.  The
00284 **     XMList class implements list box widget, and a Scrolled list box
00285 **     widget.
00286 ** Author:
00287 **   Ron Fox
00288 **   NSCL
00289 **   Michigan State University
00290 **   East Lansing, MI 48824-1321
00291 ** SCCS info:
00292 **    @(#)XMList.h      8.1 6/23/95 
00293 */
00294 #ifndef XMLIST_H_INSTALLED
00295 #define XMLIST_H_INSTALLED
00296 /*
00297 ** Include files:
00298 */
00299 #include "XMWidget.h"
00300 #include <Xm/List.h>
00301 #include <Xm/ScrolledW.h>
00302 
00303 /*
00304 **    XMListBaseClass encapsulates all the common behavior of 
00305 **    XmList widgets and XmScrolledList combo widgets.
00306 */
00307 class XMListBaseClass : public XMWidget {
00308  public:
00309   /* Constructors: */
00310 
00311   XMListBaseClass(char *n, WidgetClass cl, XMWidget &parent, 
00312                   ArgList l = NULL, Cardinal num_args = 0) :
00313                     XMWidget(n, cl, parent, l, num_args) {}
00314   XMListBaseClass(char *n, WidgetClass cl, Widget parent, 
00315                   ArgList l = NULL, Cardinal num_args = 0) :
00316                     XMWidget(n, cl, parent, l, num_args) {}
00317 
00318   XMListBaseClass(char *n)  : XMWidget(n) {}
00319   XMListBaseClass(Widget w) : XMWidget(w) {}
00320 
00321   /* Manage the attributes: */
00322 
00323   void AutoSelect(Boolean enable=True) {
00324     SetAttribute(XmNautomaticSelection, enable);
00325   }
00326   void SetDoubleClickTime(int ms = 100) {
00327     SetAttribute(XmNdoubleClickInterval, ms);
00328   }
00329   
00330   void SetRows(int rows) {
00331     SetAttribute(XmNvisibleItemCount, rows);
00332   }
00333   void SetScrollPolicy(int policy = XmAS_NEEDED) {
00334     SetAttribute(XmNscrollBarDisplayPolicy, policy);
00335   }
00336   void SetSelectionPolicy(int policy = XmSINGLE_SELECT) {
00337     SetAttribute(XmNselectionPolicy, policy);
00338   }
00339 
00340   int GetListCount() {
00341     int cnt;
00342     GetAttribute(XmNitemCount, &cnt);
00343     return cnt;
00344   }
00345   XmStringTable GetListValues() {
00346     XmStringTable list;
00347     GetAttribute(XmNitems, &list);
00348     return list;
00349   }
00350 
00351   int GetSelectedListCount() {
00352     int cnt;
00353     GetAttribute(XmNselectedItemCount, &cnt);
00354     return cnt;
00355   }
00356 
00357   XmStringTable GetSelectedItems() {
00358     XmStringTable list;
00359     GetAttribute(XmNselectedItems, &list);
00360     return list;
00361   }
00362   /* Callbacks: */
00363   
00364   Callback_data *AddbrowseSelectionCallback(void (*callback)(XMWidget *,
00365                                                              XtPointer,
00366                                                              XtPointer),
00367                                             XtPointer user_data = NULL) {
00368     return AddCallback(XmNbrowseSelectionCallback, callback, user_data);
00369   }
00370   Callback_data *AddDefaultActionCallback(void (*callback)(XMWidget *,
00371                                                            XtPointer,
00372                                                            XtPointer),
00373                                           XtPointer user_data =NULL)
00374     {
00375       return AddCallback(XmNdefaultActionCallback, callback, user_data);
00376     }
00377   Callback_data *AddExtendedSelectionCallback(void (*callback)(XMWidget *,
00378                                                                XtPointer,
00379                                                                XtPointer),
00380                                               XtPointer user_data = NULL)
00381     {
00382       return AddCallback(XmNextendedSelectionCallback, callback, user_data);
00383     }
00384   Callback_data *AddMultipleSelectionCallback(void (*callback)(XMWidget *,
00385                                                                XtPointer,
00386                                                                XtPointer),
00387                                               XtPointer user_data = NULL)
00388     {
00389       return AddCallback(XmNmultipleSelectionCallback, callback, user_data);
00390     }
00391   Callback_data *AddSingleSelectionCallback(void (*callback)(XMWidget *,
00392                                                              XtPointer ,
00393                                                              XtPointer),
00394                                             XtPointer user_data = NULL)
00395     {
00396       return AddCallback(XmNsingleSelectionCallback, callback, user_data);
00397     }
00398 
00399   /*  Behavior that is actually convenience functions for list widget: */
00400 
00401   void AddItem(char *item, int position = 0) {
00402     XmString s = XmStringCreateLtoR(item, XmSTRING_DEFAULT_CHARSET);
00403     XmListAddItem(id, s, position);
00404     XmStringFree(s);
00405   }
00406   void ClearItems() { XmListDeleteAllItems(id); }
00407   void DeleteItem(char *item) {
00408     XmString s = XmStringCreateLtoR(item, XmSTRING_DEFAULT_CHARSET);
00409     XmListDeleteItem(id, s);
00410     XmStringFree(s);
00411   }
00412   void DeleteItem(int loc = 0) {
00413     XmListDeletePos(id, loc);
00414   }
00415   void DeleteItems(int loc, int count = 1) {
00416     XmListDeleteItemsPos(id, count, loc);
00417   }
00418   void DeselectAll() {
00419     XmListDeselectAllItems(id);
00420   }
00421   void DeselectItem(char *item) {
00422     XmString s = XmStringCreateLtoR(item, XmSTRING_DEFAULT_CHARSET);
00423     XmListDeselectItem(id, s);
00424     XmStringFree(s);
00425 
00426   }
00427   void DeselectItem(int pos = 0) {
00428     XmListDeselectPos(id, pos); 
00429   }
00430   void SetBottomItem(int position = 0) {
00431     XmListSetBottomPos(id, position);
00432   }
00433 
00434   void SelectItem(int pos = 0) {
00435     XmListSelectPos(id, pos, False);
00436   }
00437 
00438 };
00439 /*
00440 **  XMList is an unscrolled list.
00441 */
00442 class XMList : public XMListBaseClass {
00443  protected:
00444  public:
00445   /* Constructors and Destructors: */
00446 
00447   XMList(char *n, XMWidget &parent, int rows = 10,
00448          ArgList args = NULL, Cardinal arg_count = 0) :
00449            XMListBaseClass(n, xmListWidgetClass, parent, args, arg_count) {
00450              SetRows(rows);
00451              Manage();
00452            }
00453   XMList(char *n, Widget parent, int rows = 10,
00454          ArgList args =NULL, Cardinal arg_count = 0) :
00455            XMListBaseClass(n, xmListWidgetClass, parent, args, arg_count) {
00456              SetRows(rows);
00457              Manage();
00458            }
00459   XMList(char *n) : XMListBaseClass(n) { Manage(); }
00460   XMList(Widget w) : XMListBaseClass(w) { Manage(); }
00461   
00462 };
00463 /*
00464 ** XMScrolledList  - A scrolled list widget.  This constructs a scrolled
00465 **                   window widget with a list widget inside.  An additional
00466 **                   attribute keeps track of the scrolled window widget.
00467 **                   The management routines (un)manage both.
00468 */
00469 class XMScrolledList : public XMListBaseClass {
00470  protected:
00471   Widget scrolled_widget;
00472 
00473  public:
00474   XMScrolledList(char *n, XMWidget &parent, int rows = 10,
00475                  ArgList args = NULL, Cardinal arg_count = 0) :
00476                    XMListBaseClass(n) { /* Cheat. */
00477                      id = XmCreateScrolledList(parent.getid(), 
00478                                                n, args, arg_count);
00479                      scrolled_widget = XtParent(id);
00480                      SetRows(rows);
00481                      Manage();
00482                      XtManageChild(scrolled_widget);
00483                    }
00484   XMScrolledList(char *n, Widget parent, int rows = 10,
00485                  ArgList args = NULL, Cardinal arg_count = 0) :
00486                    XMListBaseClass(n)  { /* Cheat. */
00487                      id = XmCreateScrolledList(parent, n, args, arg_count);
00488                      scrolled_widget = XtParent(id);
00489                      SetRows(rows);
00490                      Manage();
00491                      }
00492   /* Get the scrolled widget id:  */
00493 
00494   Widget GetScrolledWindow() { return scrolled_widget; }
00495 
00496   /* Manage from scrolled_widget: */
00497 
00498   void Manage()   { 
00499                      XtManageChild(id);
00500                      XtManageChild(scrolled_widget);
00501                   }
00502   void UnManage() { 
00503                     XtManageChild(id);
00504                     XtUnmanageChild(scrolled_widget); 
00505                   }
00506 
00507 };    
00508 
00509 #endif
